tweet: The first release by DC's 'Country Gents' is the masterfully produced 'See No Evil' featuring a sweet original vocal by 'Pavao'.
This two part EP also features two incredible remixes by Crazy P and an old style deep dub by Deep Cartel themselves.
Check out our MySpace page -- http://www.myspace.com/countrygentsuk
Listen to and/or download 'See No Evil' and the remixes -- http://countrygents.bandcamp.com
